page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Theresa writes about our area.It is a rural part of East Anglia.Aldborough is the main village centred around a pretty Green.It is 18 miles from Norwich and 6 miles from Cromer.It is a farming area with 2 more small villages Wickmere and Hanworth.The Scarrow Beck drains the fields and scattered about are small patches of mixed woodland.Aldborough has become a popular village for people who work in Norwich and many old cottages and other buildings have been converted into modern housing.There is a lively village feeling with various activities happening.There is now just one school for the area at Aldborough- the children from outlying parts being brought in by bus.Although things have changed greatly this century it is still very much rual part of England.
